text:
@realDonaldTrump COMMUNIST CHINA IS BETTER AT MEDICAL RESEARCH AND MEDICAL TREATMENT THAN THE US! 

OUR FIRST CASE OF COVID-19 WAS 1 MONTH AFTER THEIRS! WE COULD HAVE DONE OUR OWN RESEARCH AND PLANNING. 

ONE MONTH AGO CHINA ALREADY HAD COVID-19 UNDER  CONTROL! 

WE SHOULDNT NEED TO RELY ON CHINA

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
